name: EXRIS
description:
This is a simple, minimalist tetris clone, with a twist! As you play, you will slowly unlock an increasing number of blocks which could possibly come falling down! This set of blocks expands far beyond the 4-square world of tetris and into larger, more complex square sets.

Why?

I wanted to make a video game, that's why! Unfortunately, I never have any original ideas for new plots or game mechanics, and my art skills aren't too good. Naturally, I decided to take a classic and mix it up a bit!

Any Bugs?

The game is a bit quirky at the moment, but I've dealt with all the bugs I've found. I haven't tested the windows and mac releases of the game, as I don't have access to devices running windows or mac, so I don't even know if they work.

Is it worth paying for?

Probably not, but I'll let you decide that for yourself! XP
